I excel at building and maintaining scalable applications utilizing **CI/CD pipelines**, **monitoring** tools like **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, and implementing **load balancing** strategies for enhanced performance. My background in Agile methodologies drives my ability to deliver efficient solutions in collaborative environments. I also bring valuable experience in **Terraform**, **OpenShift**, and **Helm**, automating infrastructure provisioning and deployment processes. Additionally, I have expertise in database optimization with **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB**, always prioritizing system reliability and efficiency.
